dogs_parents: Our sires and dams have passed all health clearances, including bone-density levels (important when considering adopting a moon dog to live on Earth). They're pets, and live with us or guardian families in the home. They go on walks, have play dates, and live their best lives with their human and moonfolk families!
dogs_litters: Our newborn moon pups are given the best veterinary care possible from their initial checks to the final vaccinations and sign-off before they go home to their families. They're socialized with moon cats and livestock, and exposed to a variety of environments, such as craters, dusty plains, and vast expanses of endless, airless, lifeless space.
